title: HaUI Food | Online food ordering application at HaUI

errors.err04: Password must contain at least 8 characters and 1 special character @-_

cart.desc02: Add products to your cart and place your order here.
cart.desc04: Delivery fee will be automatically calculated after you place the order.

home.title06: More cool features available on the app
home.reasonText01: HauiFood provides the fastest food delivery in the market.
home.reasonText02: Now grabbing your food is just a few clicks or taps away. Order online or download our Grab super app for a faster and more rewarding experience.
home.reasonText03: From local fare to restaurant favourites, our wide selection of food will definitely satisfy all your cravings.
home.reasonText04: It’s easy to get your meals delivered to you. It’s even easier to pay for it with HauiFoodPay.
home.reasonText05: Earn HauiFoodRewards points for every order you make and use them to redeem more goodies.
home.subtitle: What is GrabFood?
home.desc01: HauiFood is the fastest Food Delivery service in Vietnam. We have curated all your favorite dishes, restaurants, and cuisines to help you grab your food in the easiest & quickest way possible. Find and order your favorite cuisines across Vietnam - order food online in just a few taps, from Lifted Coffee & Brunch - Hàng Gà for Breakfast, Maazi Indian - Nhà Hàng Ấn Độ for Lunch, Bún Cá Chấm Gốc Đa - Vũ Thạnh for Dinner! We are here to satisfy your hunger with a wide selection of merchant partners in Vietnam.
home.desc02: From small bites to big meals, we won't limit your appetite. Go ahead and order all you want.
home.desc03: Download Grab app to use other payment methods and enjoy seamless communication with your driver.

no-result.title: Sorry, there are currently no restaurants
no-result.desc: Please refresh the page to resolve the issue.

login.heading: Sign in
login.desc01: Welcome back. Sign in to continue shopping.

sign-up.heading: Sign up
sign-up.desc01: Let's start creating a new account to fully experience our features and services.

forgot-password.heading: Recover password
forgot-password.desc01: Send a forgotten password verification code via email.

verify-otp.heading: Verify OTP
verify-otp.desc01: Enter the OTP sent to your email.

reset-password.heading: Reset Password
reset-password.desc01: Please enter your new password in the box below.
